summary: A frustrated war correspondent, unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, takes the risky path of coopting the identity of a dead arms dealer acquaintance.
cast: Jack Nicholson|Maria Schneider|Jenny Runacre|Ian Hendry|Steven Berkoff|Ambroise Bia|Charles Mulvehill|Miquel Bordoy|José María Caffarel|James Campbell|Ángel del Pozo|Jaime Doria|Joan Gaspart|Narciso Pula|Gustavo Re|Enrico Sannia|Manfred Spies|Jean-Baptiste Tiemele
title: El reportero
